attributes.action: Force all UK Councils to collect non-recyclable household refuse once a week every week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to stop the risk to public health, and decrease the Fly and Rat infestations in some areas especially in the summer months.
Wheelie bins that are only emptied fortnightly not only smell but, attract unwanted attention from desease spreading vermin  and insects. 
Please sign this petition now in the interest of public health!
